channel.title: Reborn
channel.description: would anyone know how to make a reborn system. where the player can get to lvl 126 and can go back to level 3 after the have "reborn". which gives them a perminate stat increase and also gives them a +1 next to their combat level when ur mouse courser goes over it?

item.title: Reborn
item.dc:creator: @blindbandit blindbandit
item.description:
@blindbandit wrote:

This is good. i can follow but barely. i get what u are trying to say. you have made a good effort. this is what i am looking for. can we just make it basic for now and build on it. i was rather thinking on the lines of making it like donar points (if player has reborn == 1) then they get like +20 str perminate stat. i will try myself and see if i can perfect anything. for now i want to know how to write a new line in the player.txt file that can be the reborn number and with that can give the player bonus stats.

Read full topic

item.title: Reborn
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

no that’s like in flyff servers, and maybe in funorb arcanists. idk about CoD though :S
well i can implement this so it works only once and only for damage, sorry i can’t help you anymore than that i’m too tired to make some real code. and it will be really imperfect, just a base.

ok search for this:

			/* ACCOUNT */
			characterfile.write("[ACCOUNT]", 0, 9);
			characterfile.newLine();
			characterfile.write("character-username = ", 0, 21);
			characterfile.write(playerName, 0, playerName.length());
			characterfile.newLine();
			characterfile.write("character-password = ", 0, 21);
			characterfile.write(passHash(playerPass), 0, passHash(playerPass)
					.length());
			characterfile.newLine();
			characterfile.newLine();

under it you should see /* CHARACTER */

add this right under it:

			characterfile.write("character-reborn", 0, 11);
			characterfile.newLine();

now search for something like this:

case 2:
					if (token.equals("character-height")) {
						heightLevel = Integer.parseInt(token2);
					} else if (token.equals("character-posx")) {
						toX = Integer.parseInt(token2) == -1 ? 2999
								: Integer.parseInt(token2);

and add this right under case 2; :


					} else if (token.equals("character-reborn")) {
						reborn = Integer.parseInt(token2);

and add this right under public class client extends Player implements Runnable { :

[code=java]
public int reborn = 0;

[code]

search for this:

			playerMaxHit = (int) Math.floor(MaxHit);

and replace it with:


		if(reborn != 1) {
			playerMaxHit = (int) Math.floor(MaxHit + 10);
			} else {
			playerMaxHit = (int) Math.floor(MaxHit);
			}

then add this command:

		if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("reborn")) {
		if(reborn != 1) {
			sM("you can't be reborn twice!");
			}
if(reborn != 0 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) == 99 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]) == 99 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) == 99 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) == 99 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) == 99 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) == 99 && getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]) == 99) {
reborn = 1;
sM("you are now reborn!");
playerLevel[0] = 1;
playerLevel[1] = 1;
playerLevel[2] = 1;
playerLevel[3] = 1;
playerLevel[4] = 1;
playerLevel[5] = 1;
playerLevel[7] = 1;
}
}

save and compile and test it out.
NOTE: backup your client.java!!! i am not sure if this will work, and you might get errors. if so just tell me in here and i will see what i can do to help.

Read full topic
